 */

/** Chothia's amino acid and nucleotide atom vdw radii */
export var VdWLookup = [-1.0, 1.76, 1.87, 1.65, 1.50, 1.40, 1.85, 1.80, 1.60, 1.40 // 9: P (nucleic)
]; // can still be appended on-the-fly for rare elements like selenium

/** Maximum accessible surface area observed for amino acids. Taken from: http://dx.doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0080635 */

export var MaxAsa = {
  'ALA': 121.0,
  'ARG': 265.0,
  'ASN': 187.0,
  'ASP': 187.0,
  'CYS': 148.0,
  'GLU': 214.0,
  'GLN': 214.0,
  'GLY': 97.0,
  'HIS': 216.0,
  'ILE': 195.0,
  'LEU': 191.0,
  'LYS': 230.0,
  'MET': 203.0,
  'PHE': 228.0,
  'PRO': 154.0,
  'SER': 143.0,
  'THR': 163.0,
  'TRP': 264.0,
  'TYR': 255.0,
  'VAL': 165.0
};
export var DefaultMaxAsa = 121.0;

sourcesContent:
/**
 * Copyright (c) 2019 mol* contributors, licensed under MIT, See LICENSE file for more info.
 *
 * @author Sebastian Bittrich <sebastian.bittrich@rcsb.org>
 */
/** Chothia's amino acid and nucleotide atom vdw radii */
export var VdWLookup = [
    -1.0,
    1.76,
    1.87,
    1.65,
    1.50,
    1.40,
    1.85,
    1.80,
    1.60,
    1.40 // 9: P (nucleic)
]; // can still be appended on-the-fly for rare elements like selenium
/** Maximum accessible surface area observed for amino acids. Taken from: http://dx.doi.org/10.1371/journal.pone.0080635 */
export var MaxAsa = {
    'ALA': 121.0,
    'ARG': 265.0,
    'ASN': 187.0,
    'ASP': 187.0,
    'CYS': 148.0,
    'GLU': 214.0,
    'GLN': 214.0,
    'GLY': 97.0,
    'HIS': 216.0,
    'ILE': 195.0,
    'LEU': 191.0,
    'LYS': 230.0,
    'MET': 203.0,
    'PHE': 228.0,
    'PRO': 154.0,
    'SER': 143.0,
    'THR': 163.0,
    'TRP': 264.0,
    'TYR': 255.0,
    'VAL': 165.0
};
export var DefaultMaxAsa = 121.0;
//# sourceMappingURL=common.js.map
